name: Frogger (1997)
description:
Frogger (1997) is an arcade game developed by Hasbro Interactive. It was originally released in 1997. It was published by Hasbro Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Frogger (1997) is available on PC.
Andrei Nadin, Chris Down, Ian Saunter and Michael S. Glosecki produced the game. It was scored by Andrew Barnabas and Paul Arnold.
